seniority_level.evidence: 3-5 years experience requirement with mid-level data engineering responsibilities, no 'Senior' in title but experience level suggests mid-level position

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with core focus on data pipelines, ingestion, and processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on SFTP file transfers, batch data processing, automated file monitoring, and scheduled data transfers rather than real-time streaming

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team management, direct reports, or leadership responsibilities; focus is on individual technical work and automation

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Cloud explicitly mentioned as required skill, while AWS and GCP only listed as nice-to-have

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP mentioned as nice-to-have skills, indicating secondary cloud options

processing_paradigm.evidence: SFTP file transfers, automated file monitoring, and scheduled data transfers indicate batch processing focus rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned; only Python and Shell scripting for automation tasks

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or storage systems mentioned; focus is entirely on SFTP transfer mechanisms

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite work model specified with Cincinnati, OH location, requiring local presence in the region

timezone_focus.evidence: Cincinnati, OH location suggests Eastern Time Zone focus, but no explicit timezone requirements mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite position in Cincinnati, OH with no remote work option suggests relocation would be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, and TCS typically requires existing work authorization for such positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support (OPT/CPT) and standard work authorization requirements typically exclude F1 visa holders

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, implying standard work authorization in US is sufficient

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time position with annual salary range provided suggests W2 employment rather than contractor arrangement

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or promotion paths mentioned in job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, collaborative environment, or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression opportunities mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, team changes, or role exploration opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (SFTP, GoAnywhere, Azure) and nice-to-have skills (AWS, GCP), with balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on SFTP data engineering with well-defined responsibilities around data transfers and pipeline management

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3-5 years experience requirement aligns well with mid-level data engineering role; skills are appropriate and realistic for the seniority level
